General.Name: The RealReal Inc
General.Description: The RealReal, Inc. operates an online marketplace for resale luxury goods in the United State. It offers various product categories, including women's fashion, men's fashion, jewelry, and watches. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 55 Francisco Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94133

4.Name: Mr. Paul Judd Bieber
4.Title: Head of Investor Relations & Capital Markets
